file.name: SwaggerControllerAPI.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: "Ethparser Swagger API"
  description: "Obtaining data on Harvest and HardWork"
  version: "1.0.0"
servers:
  - url: "https://ethparser-api.herokuapp.com"
    description: "Prod server"
  - url: "https://ethparser-stage.harvestfi.builders"
    description: "Stage server"
  - url: "http://localhost:8082"
    description: "Local server"
paths:
  /user_balances:
    get:
      tags:
        - HarvestController
      summary: "Returns balances of owners"
      operationId: "userBalances"
      parameters:
        - name: network
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Working network"
          schema:
            type: string
            default: eth
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/UserBalance'
        404:
          description: Not found response
  /history/harvest/{address}:
    get:
      tags:
        - HarvestController
      summary: "Returns vault history for a given owner address"
      operationId: "addressHistoryHarvest"
      parameters:
        - name: address
          in: path
          required: true
          description: "Owner's address"
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: from
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Block creation time from (inclusive)"
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: to
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Block creation time to"
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: network
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Working network"
          schema:
            type: string
            default: eth
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/HarvestDTO'
  /harvest/pages:
    get:
      tags:
        - HarvestController
      summary: "Return whole vaults history by page pattern"
      operationId: "harvestPages"
      parameters:
        - name: pageSize
          in: query
          required: true
          description: "Number of items per page"
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: page
          in: query
          required: true
          description: "Page number"
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: ordering
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Sorting (asc/desc)"
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: vault
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Vault address"
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: minAmount
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Minimum amount in dollars"
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
        - name: network
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Working network"
          schema:
            type: string
            default: eth
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestResponse'
  /api/transactions/last/harvest:
    get:
      tags:
        - HarvestController
      summary: "Returns the latest data for each vault"
      description: "Obtaining a list of data of unique 'vault_address' in the same network. The list is sorted by 'vault_address' and 'block date'"
      operationId: "fetchLatest"
      parameters:
        - name: network
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Working network"
          schema:
            type: string
            default: eth
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/HarvestDTO'
  /api/transactions/history/harvest:
    get:
      tags:
        - HarvestController
      summary: "Returns whole history for all vaults"
      operationId: "harvestHistoryData"
      parameters:
        - name: from
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Block creation time from"
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: to
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Block creation time to (inclusive)"
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: reduce
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Reduces the amount of result data"
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
            default: 1
        - name: network
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Working network"
          schema:
            type: string
            default: eth
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/HarvestDTO'
  /api/transactions/history/harvest/{name}:
    get:
      tags:
        - HarvestController
      summary: "Returns history data of vault for a given address"
      operationId: "harvestHistoryDataForVault_1"
      parameters:
        - name: name
          in: path
          required: true
          description: "Repository address name"
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: reduce
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Reduces the amount of result data"
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
            default: 1
        - name: start
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Block creation time from"
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
            default: 0
        - name: end
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Block creation time to"
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
            default: 9223372036854775807
        - name: network
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Working network"
          schema:
            type: string
            default: eth
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/HarvestDTO'
  /total_saved_gas_fee_by_address:
    get:
      tags:
        - HardWorkController
      summary: "Returns the total saved gas fee the ETH address"
      operationId: "totalSavedGasFeeByEthAddress"
      parameters:
        - name: address
          in: query
          required: true
          description: "Owner's address"
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: network
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Working network"
          schema:
            type: string
            default: ETH
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestResponse'
  /last_saved_gas_sum:
    get:
      tags:
        - HardWorkController
      summary: "Returns the last saved amount of gas"
      operationId: "lastSavedGasSum"
      parameters:
        - name: network
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Working network"
          schema:
            type: string
            default: eth
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestResponse'
  /last/hardwork:
    get:
      tags:
        - HardWorkController
      summary: "Returns the latest data for HardWork"
      operationId: "lastHardWork"
      parameters:
        - name: network
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Working network"
          schema:
            type: string
            default: eth
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/HardWorkDTO'
  /hardwork/pages:
    get:
      tags:
        - HardWorkController
      summary: "Return whole HardWork history by page pattern"
      operationId: "hardworkPages"
      parameters:
        - name: pageSize
          in: query
          required: true
          description: "Number of items per page"
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: page
          in: query
          required: true
          description: "Page number"
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: ordering
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Sorting (asc/desc)"
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: vault
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Vault address"
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: minAmount
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Minimum amount in dollars"
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
        - name: network
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Working network"
          schema:
            type: string
            default: eth
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestResponse'
  /api/transactions/last/hardwork:
    get:
      tags:
        - HardWorkController
      summary: "Returns the latest data for HardWorks"
      operationId: "lastHardWorks"
      parameters:
        - name: network
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Working network"
          schema:
            type: string
            default: eth
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/HardWorkDTO'
  /api/transactions/history/hardwork:
    get:
      tags:
        - HardWorkController
      summary: "Returns whole history for HardWork"
      operationId: "historyHardWork"
      parameters:
        - name: reduce
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Reduces the amount of result data"
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
            default: 1
        - name: from
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Block creation time from"
          schema:
            type: string
            default: 0
        - name: to
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Block creation time to (inclusive)"
          schema:
            type: string
            default: 9223372036854775807
        - name: network
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Working network"
          schema:
            type: string
            default: eth
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/HardWorkDTO'
  /api/transactions/history/hardwork/{name}:
    get:
      tags:
        - HardWorkController
      summary: "Returns history HardWork for a given address"
      operationId: "historyHardWorkByName"
      parameters:
        - name: name
          in: path
          required: true
          description: "Repository address name"
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: start
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Block creation time from"
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: reduce
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Reduces the amount of result data"
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
            default: 1
        - name: end
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Block creation time to"
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: network
          in: query
          required: false
          description: "Working network"
          schema:
            type: string
            default: eth
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/HardWorkDTO'
tags:
  - name: HarvestController
    description: "Obtaining data on Harvest"
  - name: HardWorkController
    description: "Obtaining data on HardWork"
components:
  schemas:
    UserBalance:
      type: object
      properties:
        owner:
          type: string
        balance:
          type: number
          format: double
    HarvestDTO:
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
        hash:
          type: string
        block:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        network:
          type: string
        confirmed:
          type: integer
        blockDate:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        methodName:
          type: string
        owner:
          type: string
        amount:
          type: number
          format: double
        amountIn:
          type: number
          format: double
        vault:
          type: string
        vaultAddress:
          type: string
        lastGas:
          type: number
          format: double
        lastTvl:
          type: number
          format: double
        lastUsdTvl:
          type: number
          format: double
        ownerCount:
          type: integer
        sharePrice:
          type: number
          format: double
        usdAmount:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        lpStat:
          type: string
        ownerBalance:
          type: number
          format: double
        ownerBalanceUsd:
          type: number
          format: double
        allOwnersCount:
          type: integer
        allPoolsOwnersCount:
          type: integer
        migrated:
          type: boolean
        underlyingPrice:
          type: number
          format: double
        underlyingAddress:
          type: string
        migration:
          type: object
        profit:
          type: number
          format: double
        profitUsd:
          type: number
          format: double
        totalAmount:
          type: number
          format: double
    RestResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        data:
          type: string
        code:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
        block:
          type: integer
          format: int64
    HardWorkDTO:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
        vault:
          type: string
        vaultAddress:
          type: string
        block:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        blockDate:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        network:
          type: string
        shareChange:
          type: number
          format: double
        fullRewardUsd:
          type: number
          format: double
        farmBuyback:
          type: number
          format: double
        fee:
          type: number
          format: double
        farmBuybackEth:
          type: number
          format: double
        gasUsed:
          type: number
          format: double
        invested:
          type: number
          format: double
        investmentTarget:
          type: number
          format: double
        farmPrice:
          type: number
          format: double
        ethPrice:
          type: number
          format: double
        profitSharingRate:
          type: number
          format: double
        buyBackRate:
          type: number
          format: double
        autoStake:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        idleTime:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        feeEth:
          type: number
          format: double
        weeklyAverageTvl:
          type: number
          format: double
        savedGasFeesSum:
          type: number
          format: double
        savedGasFees:
          type: number
          format: double
        poolUsers:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        callsQuantity:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        farmBuybackSum:
          type: number
          format: double
        psApr:
          type: number
          format: double
        psTvlUsd:
          type: number
          format: double
        weeklyProfit:
          type: number
          format: double
        weeklyAllProfit:
          type: number
          format: double
        fullRewardUsdTotal:
          type: number
          format: double
        tvl:
          type: number
          format: double
        allProfit:
          type: number
          format: double
        periodOfWork:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        psPeriodOfWork:
          type: integer
          format: int64

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /api/transactions/history/hardwork: get: operation "historyHardWork": parameters: parse parameter "from": schema: parse default: expected type "string", got "number"
